steps.title: Start with 1 tablet twice a day.
steps.content: Start with 1 tablet twice a day. Take 1 tablet at a time. Drink a glass of water with your tablet. Take each tablet 30-60 minutes before a meal. Do not take a pill within 5 hours of your bedtime. [3] X Research source Try to take the pills before the main meals of your day. If you eat a full breakfast and lunch, these are your best options. You can take your pill before dinner as long as you do so more than 5 hours before your bedtime.

steps.title: Increase your dosage after 3 days.
steps.content: Increase your dosage after 3 days. If you have taken 2 pills twice a day and have not experienced any unpleasant symptoms, go ahead and increase your dosage to 2 capsules, twice daily. [4] X Research source Do not take more than 2 capsules in 4 hours. Do not take more than 4 capsules in 24 hours.

steps.title: Drink 8-10 glasses of water a day.
steps.content: Drink 8-10 glasses of water a day. The manufacturers of Hydroxycut ask all clients to drink at least 8 glasses of water a day. While they do not say why, it is probably meant to counteract the high caffeine content of Hydroxycut. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Try it out by taking 1 tablet once a day.
steps.content: Try it out by taking 1 tablet once a day. Take 1 tablet 30-60 minutes before you eat a meal. Do not snack between meals. [6] X Research source Hydroxycut Hardcore contains even more caffeine than Hydroxycut Pro Clinical and other Hydroxycut products. Do not take more than the recommended amount of this product.

steps.title: Up your dosage after 3 days.
steps.content: Up your dosage after 3 days. After taking 1 pill a day for 3 days, take 2 pills on the 4th day. Do this only if you haven't had any adverse effects from taking 1 pill. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Use for at least 2 months with diet and training.
steps.content: Use for at least 2 months with diet and training. Hydroxycut Hardcore is meant to be used as a workout supplement. Use it for at least 60 days in combination with exercise and a healthy diet. Stop use immediately if you feel strange or notice any side effects.

steps.title: Notice signs of liver damage.
steps.content: Notice signs of liver damage. Hydroxycut has been linked to potentially fatal liver damage. While fewer deaths have been reported in recent years, cases of liver damage continue to be linked to Hydroxycut use. Discontinue use immediately and seek medical help if you experience any of these symptoms, most of which will appear 2-12 weeks after you begin taking the pills: [8] X Research source Fatigue Nausea Abdominal pain Dark urine Jaundice

steps.title: Watch out for symptoms of caffeine overdose.
steps.content: Watch out for symptoms of caffeine overdose. Hydroxycut products include a list of ingredients but do not include the proportions of ingredients used. However, based on toxicity reports and the company's warning to drink a lot of water with the product, it's likely that Hydroxycut contains high amounts of caffeine. Too much caffeine can be fatal, so visit the doctor if you are experiencing the following symptoms while taking Hydroxycut: Difficulty sleeping Agitation, anxiety, or confusion Frequent urination An irregular or racing heartbeat Muscle twitching Ringing in the ears Stomach pain Seizures

steps.title: Consult a doctor if you are on other medications.
steps.content: Consult a doctor if you are on other medications. Most formulations of Hydroxycut have been shown to interact with a wide variety of medications. Talk to your doctor before you start administering Hydroxycut to yourself. Drugs that are affected by Hydroxycut may include antidepressants, antibiotics, and stimulants.

steps.title: Report any issues with the pills.
steps.content: Report any issues with the pills. For doctors to diagnose you, take note of the exact version of Hydroxycut you have taken, as well as any other supplements you might be on. Bring in the bottle if you can. This will also help doctors report your case to the FDA if they determine that the Hydroxycut has caused your symptoms. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Make time for regular aerobic exercise
steps.content: Make time for regular aerobic exercise . Every week, plan to get 150 minutes of moderate aerobic exercise or 75 minutes of vigorous aerobic exercise. Rather than doing all your exercise at once, try exercising several times a week. Find forms of exercise you enjoy, and commit to doing them regularly. [10] X Trustworthy Source Mayo Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source Try moderate aerobic exercises, such as walking, biking on even terrain, or dancing. A moderate aerobic activity is one you can talk through. [11] X Trustworthy Source Centers for Disease Control and Prevention Main public health institute for the US, run by the Dept. of Health and Human Services Go to source Experiment with different forms of vigorous aerobic activity, such as swimming, fast biking, or running. Aerobic activity is considered vigorous if it makes talking difficult. [12] X Trustworthy Source Centers for Disease Control and Prevention Main public health institute for the US, run by the Dept. of Health and Human Services Go to source

steps.title: Eat well
steps.content: Eat well . Strive for consistency in your mealtimes, but diversity in your foodstuffs. Eat fruits and vegetables every day, and make sure you don't skip your carbohydrates or protein. You need carbohydrates to work out, and protein to help your muscles grow and repair. [13] X Research source If you snack, eat vegetables and fruits. If you want a treat, go for natural high-fat over high-sugar. Small servings of nuts, yogurt, and hummus will satisfy your craving without putting you over the edge. [14] X Trustworthy Source Mayo Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source

steps.title: Drink water, not soda.
steps.content: Drink water, not soda. Being properly hydrated is essential to your health and energy. Drink whenever you're thirsty, and try for about 8 glasses a day. While you should primarily drink water, other beverages such as juice, milk, nut milk, coffee, tea, and even beer or wine can all contribute to your hydration. However, you'll lose more weight if you avoid high-sugar beverages, such as soda and alcohol. [15] X Trustworthy Source Mayo Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source Drink water before and after exercise. Drink more water on days when you sweat, vomit, or have diarrhea. You'll know you're hydrated when your urine is clear. [16] X Trustworthy Source Mayo Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source

steps.title: Get 7-8 hours of sleep a night
steps.content: Get 7-8 hours of sleep a night . Sleep regulates your hormones, helping you process calories appropriately. If you are an adult and you get more or less than 7-8 hours of sleep a night you are at risk for weight gain. Teenagers should aim for 8-10 hours.
